page.title: 11HEALTH
page.content: {District Nursing.}The peninsular east of Maldon is one area of district nursing. It is divided into three parts - Maldon, Burnham and Southminster.{Tillingham, Ashldham, {Dengie and Bradwell}are included in the{Southminster area.}Three sisters, three state enrolled nurses and three auxilary nurses are employed for the whole district.From{January to June {1985}the Southminster sister travelled {4,677 miles}and made approximately{724 {visits}(some of these would have been made by an auxilary).Total{patients}on her books varied between{45 and 57, the majority of whom were aged between {65 and 84 years.} {Stammers Funeral Service}organizes 140 to 150 funerals each year. 60% are cremations and 40% are burials.The cost of a funeral is about Â£400.00.
